---
id: WEB-002
title: Simplify ReadingPane UI for Children
status: IMPLEMENTED
owner: User
description: Reduce cognitive load by moving configuration options (Dyslexia Font, High Contrast) into a settings menu, leaving only primary actions visible.
---

# User Story
As a child user, I want a simple interface with few buttons so that I don't get confused.

# Acceptance Criteria
- [x] The main toolbar should only show primary actions (Record, Read Aloud, Close).
- [x] A "Settings" (Cogwheel) button should be visible.
- [x] Clicking Settings reveals options for:
    - Dyslexia Font
    - High Contrast
    - (Optional) Play Simulation (if needed)
- [x] The menu can be closed or toggles are inline.
